xwikidoc.name: SolrTranslations
xwikidoc.creator: xwiki:XWiki.Admin
xwikidoc.author: xwiki:XWiki.Admin
xwikidoc.title: Solr Search Translations
xwikidoc.content:
### Missing: solr.admin.title=Solr Search Administration ### Missing: solr.admin.submit=Apply ### Missing: solr.admin.error.notallowed=You are not allowed to perform this action. ### Missing: solr.admin.error.norights=Administration rights are required to access this section.
### Missing: solr.admin.status.title=Status ### Missing: solr.admin.status.queueSize.label=Queue Size ### Missing: solr.admin.status.queueSize.hint=The number of entities that are left to be indexed, re-indexed or deleted from the index (depending on the executed action).
### Missing: solr.admin.indexing.title=Indexing ### Missing: solr.admin.indexing.action.label=Action ### Missing: solr.admin.indexing.action.hint=The action to perform on the index. ### Missing: solr.admin.indexing.action.select_index=Add to index ### Missing: solr.admin.indexing.action.select_delete=Delete from index ### Missing: solr.admin.indexing.action.select_reindex=Reindex ### Missing: solr.admin.indexing.wiki.label=Wiki ### Missing: solr.admin.indexing.wiki.hint=The wiki for which all its documents will be affected by the selected action. ### Missing: solr.admin.indexing.wiki.select_farm=Entire farm ### Missing: solr.admin.indexing.query.label=Custom query ### Missing: solr.admin.indexing.query.hint=Optional query to limit the documents that will be affected by the selected action in the index.
solr.sortBy=Sorter etter solr.sortBy.score=Relevanse solr.sortBy.title_sort=Tittel ### Missing: solr.sortBy.date=Last Modification Date ### Missing: solr.sortBy.author_display_sort=Last Author ### Missing: solr.sortBy.filename_sort=File Name solr.sortBy.attsize_sort=Filstørrelse ### Missing: solr.sortBy.attdate_sort=Upload Date solr.sortBy.attauthor_display_sort=Lastet inn av solr.sortOrder.asc=Stigende solr.sortOrder.desc=Synkende

### Missing: solr.field.type=Result type solr.field.locale=Språk ### Missing: solr.field.locale.emptyValue=No Language ### Missing: solr.field.locale.emptyValue.hint=Some documents don't have a language set because they contain scripts (which are not written in a natural language) or they make up the user interface which is displayed in the current language (like this page). ### Missing: solr.field.wiki=Wiki ### Missing: solr.field.spaces=Location ### Missing: solr.field.space_exact=Location ### Missing: solr.field.space_facet=Location ### Missing: solr.field.name=Page ### Missing: solr.field.name_exact=Page solr.field.title=Tittel ### Missing: solr.field.author=Last Author ### Missing: solr.field.author_display=Last Author ### Missing: solr.field.creator=Creator ### Missing: solr.field.creator_display=Creator ### Missing: solr.field.date=Last Modification Date ### Missing: solr.field.creationdate=Creation Date ### Missing: solr.field.doccontent=Rendered Document Content ### Missing: solr.field.doccontentraw=Raw Document Content ### Missing: solr.field.class=Object Type ### Missing: solr.field.class.definedBy=Defined by {0} \u00BB {1} ### Missing: solr.field.propertyname=Property Name ### Missing: solr.field.propertyvalue=Property Value ### Missing: solr.field.filename=Attachment Name ### Missing: solr.field.attcontent=Attachment Content ### Missing: solr.field.comment=Comments ### Missing: solr.field.objcontent=Objects ### Missing: solr.field.mimetype=File Type ### Missing: solr.field.attauthor=Uploaded By ### Missing: solr.field.attauthor_display=Uploaded By ### Missing: solr.field.attdate=Upload Date solr.field.attsize=Filstørrelse
